creator: jhun_kam@yahoo.com
text:
Hello dear Apache,

<app:test/> when commented into <!--app:test--/>, works fine.

<app:test></app:test> when commented into <!--app:test></app:test-->, is wrong
in tomcat 5.0.28, while it works in tomcat 4.x

Please help. Thanks before.

creator: yoavs@computer.org
text:
Yup, this is a change in JSP Spec 2.0 which has been covered numerous times on
the mailing list.  It's not a bug, Tomcat is doing the right thing.  You need
white space between the tags.
